Well, you can say about Dead by Daylight whatever you want. It's a game that undoubtably has its fair share of flaws and bugs, yet it was never a game i really get tired of. Even tho im rly not too much into the Horror Genre, Dead by Daylight has been one of my fav. Games for quite a while. Sure its Community is a bit toxic, but if you dont take everything too seriously you can still enjoy this game lots. Playing with friends is propably one of the most fun things ever as well, compared to other games. Also a interesting part of the game is the fact that even tho i play it for a while now, i still easily get scared by a killer aproaching or some random jump scares of some ghost face suddenly popping around the corner. I know this isnt the most helpfull review i guess but as a final thing i want to say. If you have at least 1 friend to play it with then give it a try. You propably wont regret it :)

Awesome game... when it works. Despite receiving patch after patch, the game still experiences a complete inability to load the map at times. When it happens, you either have to wait for it to finally load (if it does), or quit the game entirely. If you wait it out and finally do load the map, one player is always missing for some reason. It also doesn't seem to be well optimized; there is no reason why the game shouldn't always be over 120 FPS on a GTX 1070 (or lower-end GPU); however, it can be well under 100 in some places, which is very odd. The maps aren't huge, the graphics are definitely nothing special, and the maximum amount of simultaneous players is 5 (including the killer). Also, the game stupidly doesn't allow for 144 hertz; you have to hack it in. It's very easy to do, but a lack of official support continues to support the notion that this game was developed very sloppily.

Pick it up when it's half off; I wouldn't buy it for anything more. I have easily gotten a lot of fun out of it; however, it's the principle of the matter. Don't support lazy development.

Update on 2019-06-19: the problematic loading appears to have significantly gone down. However, something that I forgot to mention before is that matchmaking is very bad; it can take very long to join a match - especially as a killer. The developers state that they will bring in dedicated servers. It's a shame that they were too lazy/cheap to do that from the beginning. For now, the killer acts as the host, which, as you may guess, doesn't always work out very well.

Another problem is the complete lack if filters. Even if I'm willing to play a game where the killer has a high ping, I usually can't due to everyone else leaving. If the developers went to "How To Make a Game 101," they would've known to include filters (for example: only allowing your client [your computer] to join a game where the ping is a maximum of X amount).

Pretty nice game!

Started 2018 as a solo surv main and soon started to adapt to killer too.
The game has changed a lot and ngl I kinda miss the old Dbd BUT!!! I can not deny the progress this game has made over the years.

I started playing with friends end of 2019 and it was even more fun. 
Coordinating with my friends and playing around with the killer made us cry from laughter. I would definitely recommend this game to anyone actually.

The campers etc. can be pretty frustrating but it literally can't take away the positive experiences I have made while playing this game.

Puede que al "principio" pueda parecer un tanto divertido, la adrenalina de sentir que te persigue un asesino o bien la sed de sangre de matar a todos y bla bla bla, en la teorica es una brillante mecanica, no nueva, pero diveritda. Pero en verdad en si es un juego bastante frustrante y muchas veces injusto y completamente desequilibrado sin olvidar los bugs que aveces pueden ser completamente frustrantes en el juego.

Primero que nada, mathmaking completamente inexistente, en donde puedes estar empezando recien y emparejarte con asesinos con habilidades super avanzadas y de muchisimas horas de juego o a su vez puedes estar empezando como asesino y te salen supervivientes con habilidades completamente metas y con cientos de horas en el juego, o tambien como superviviente puedes andar sumamente avanzado, con cientos de horas en el juego y te toca con un equipo que recien empieza. Un matchmaking asi no solo lo vuelve injusto, sino completamente aburrido y fustrante de jugar. Y no contentos con emparejarte con cualquiera que ande buscando sin filtro alguno, te pueden salir asesinos o superviviente tanto de menos de 100 de ping como de mas de 500, cosa que mata completamente la experiencia de juego y un completo FASTIDIO tener que buscar una y otra vez para que salga un asesino con relativamente buen ping (almenos < 300).

Pero lo que en verdad me mato en el juego fue que [b]recien desbloqueada[/b] una habilidad relativamente rara de conseguir y realmente util, por alguna razon simplemente DESAPARECIO, asi de simple, luego de [b]equiparmela[/b] e incluso [b]usarla[/b] en un par de partidas (donde entre una y otro se tardo demasiao en encontrar por culpa del horrible ping), solo desaparecio, aun reiniciando el juego y verificando integridad de archivos solo desaparecio. Esto genera una verdadera frustracion y rabia puesto que por muchas horas que puedas aplicarle al juego, que exista esa absurda posibilidad de bug de que te aparezca algo super raro de conseguir y que solo desaparezca sin motivo alguno, produce una desmotivacion enorme a seguir jugando...

Ah y no hay que olvidar que si compras el juego, solo compras la mitad o menos de la mitad, porque la mayoria de los asesinos y supervivientes son de dlc en el que en cada dlc solo consiste en 1 asesino con 1 superviviente y siempre que sacan un dlc sacan un asesino ABSURDAMENTE desbalanceado y que aveces lo nerfean a tal punto que puede volverse uno de los peores en el juego, ademas de que rara vez o mas bien dicho practicamente nunca sacan asesinos y supervivientes gratis.


PD: lo del ping no es por mi internet debido a que tengo 200 megas de internet e incluso he jugado con con amigos y siempre tengo o bien igual ping o incluso mejor que ellos.
